value: We’re finally getting started with filming the brand new program.
It seems I will try my best… to convey the enjoyment of tea ceremonies to the children.
The foundation of tea ceremonies is consideration. When you reach your seats､ first…
frame: 会話後、走り回る男の子と女の子

value: …Aah! You must not run around like that. You cannot eat the sweets without permission…!
At this rate､ we won’t be able to continue filming. We have no other choice but to pause for now. Take five.
Hmm… The children’s response is even worse than we expected. This is a worry…
My apologies… I’ll attempt to think of some sort of solution during this break.
The reason for the stalling of the filming was due to my own lack of abilities…
I cannot cause more problems for them any more than this.
Additionally､ there is a possibility that people may think of tea ceremonies as just a formality used for social status.
I cannot flounder in a place like this. I have to do something about it…!
